content: cheer up your space with a giant crochet daisy bouquet featuring vivid shades of red heart super saver the yarn is worked double for sturdiness as you practice a variety of crochet stitches each piece is worked twice to form reversible flowers that are breathtaking from any angle pick up stuffing and floral wire from the craft store to give your bouquet added form with endless color choices available from super saver it s easy to create a customized bouquet to uplift someone s day materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m note yarn amounts for 5 flowers shown contrast a soft white 0316 1 ball or 70 yds/64 m contrast b gold 0321 1 ball or 190 yds/173 m contrast c shocking pink 0718 1 ball or 125 yds/114 m contrast d pretty n pink 0722 1 ball or 125 yds/114 m contrast e persimmon 0220 1 ball or 125 yds/114 m contrast f coral 0726 1 ball or 125 yds/114 m contrast g spring green 0672 1 ball or 290 yds/264 m measurement flower width = approx 9 23 cm gauge 11 single_crochet and 13 row = 4 10 cm with 2 strands of yarn held decrease
